cause.description:
Rihanna is not talking about her "car" and her "engine" is NOT ready to blow. Does she think we're dumb!! Its about SEX SEX SEX!!!!!!!! Get with it.
1. It's promoting sex.
2. Its a good song
3. Its not about a car
cause.name: We all know Shut up and Drive IS NOT about RIHANNA'S CAR!!!
